scenario: Domestic flight delayed beyond two hours
passenger_rights: Airline shall provide free meals and refreshments in relation to the waiting time

scenario: Domestic flight delayed beyond six hours
passenger_rights: Passenger shall be offered an alternate flight or a full refund, as per DGCA norms
Airline shall provide hotel accommodation and transfers free of charge

scenario: Flight cancelled with less than 24 hours notice
conditions: Cancellation informed less than 24 hours before departure
passenger_rights: Passenger shall be entitled to compensation or an alternate flight, along with a full refund as applicable

scenario: Refund when flight is cancelled by airline
passenger_rights: Passenger shall be entitled to a full refund of the ticket amount

scenario: Denied boarding due to overbooking without passenger consent
conditions: Passenger has valid ticket and check-in completed
passenger_rights: Passenger shall be entitled to compensation, alternate flight or refund as per DGCA regulations
Airline shall provide necessary assistance and compensation as per DGCA norms
Passenger shall be compensated for loss of baggage as per DGCA prescribed limits

scenario: Rights of persons with disability or reduced mobility
conditions: Passenger has disability or reduced mobility
passenger_rights: Airline shall provide necessary assistance at no additional cost, including boarding, seating, and disembarkation support
